tit.j: 久美浜シーサイド温泉

sen.j: 久美浜シーサイド温泉（くみはまシーサイドおんせん）は、京都府京丹後市久美浜町湊宮（旧国丹後国）にある温泉。
sen.e: Kumihama Seaside Onsen Hot Spring is a hot spring located in Minatomiya Kumihama-cho Kyotango City Kyoto Prefecture (Tango Province under the ancient administrative division)
Kumihama Seaside Onsen Hot Spring is a hot spring located in Minatomiya Kumihama-cho Kyotango City Kyoto Prefecture (Tango Province under the ancient administrative division)
Kumihama Seaside Onsen Hot Spring is a hot spring located in Minatomiya, Kumihama-cho, Kyotango City, Kyoto Prefecture (Tango Province under the ancient administrative division).
sen.cmt: カンマ、ピリオドを追加しました。

sen.j: 久美の浜温泉が一部で久美浜温泉と称しているなどの混乱はあるが、場所がまったく違い、温泉郷の形態もなしていない。
sen.e: It may be confused with Kuminohama Hot Spring, because some call Kuminohama Hot Spring Kumihama Onsen Hot Spring, but the two hot springs are away from each other and do not constitute the same hot spring resort area.

It may be confused with Kuminohama Hot Spring, because some call Kuminohama Hot Spring Kumihama Onsen Hot Spring, but the two hot springs are located in two completely different places and do not constitute the same hot spring resort area.

It may be confused with Kuminohama Hot Spring, because some call Kuminohama Hot Spring Kumihama Onsen Hot Spring, but the two hot springs are located in two completely different places and do not constitute the same hot spring resort area.

sen.j: 直線距離で約5km離れている。
sen.e: It is about 5 kilometer between the two hot springs as the crow flies.
It is about 5 kilometer between the two hot springs as the crow flies.
It is about five kilometer between the two hot springs as the crow flies.
sen.cmt: 数字をスペルアウトしました。

sen.j: 鉄道 北近畿タンゴ鉄道久美浜駅より車で10分
sen.e: Railway: a 10-minute drive from Kumihama Station of Kitakinki Tango Railway.
Railway: a 10-minute drive from Kumihama Station of Kitakinki Tango Railway.
Railway: a ten-minute drive from Kumihama Station of Kitakinki Tango Railway
sen.cmt: 数字をスペルアウトしました。

sen.j: 硫酸塩泉（弱アルカリ性）
sen.e: Sulfate spring water (alkalescent)
Sulfate spring water (alkalescent)
Sulfate spring water (alkalescent)

sen.j: ほぼ湖をなす久美浜湾の西岸に面する、碧翠御苑1軒宿。
sen.e: Only one inn, Hekisui Gyoen, stands facing the west coast of the Kumihama Bay, which is nearly forming a lake.
Only one inn, Hekisui Gyoen, stands facing the west coast of the Kumihama Bay, which nearly forms a lake.
Only one inn, Hekisui Gyoen, stands facing the west coast of the Kumihama Bay, which nearly forms a lake.

sen.j: その自家泉源という形態。
sen.e: The hot spring is privately owned by the inn.
The hot spring is privately owned by the inn.
The hot spring is privately owned by the inn.

sen.j: 約1万坪の敷地に14室しかないのと、周りに何もないので温泉街は形成されていない。
sen.e: A hot spring resort area is not formed, because nothing stands except for the building of 14 guest rooms in a facility of 10,000 tsubo (33,000 square meters).
A hot spring resort area is not formed, because nothing stands except a 14 guest room building of 10,000 tsubo (33,000 square meters).
A hot spring resort area is not formed, because nothing stands except a fourteen guest room building of 10,000 tsubo (33,000 square meters).
sen.cmt: 数字をスペルアウトしました。
